title: 24 Season 1 Complete
description:
We all know what this is, 24 Season 1 Complete. Ripped from DVD straight to AppleTV format. I also tried to keep it a decent size per file while maintaining nice resolution :)

These are all MP4 files so they can be played thru iTunes, Quicktimes or VLC on a regular PC or Mac. I made them in a format that is easily convertible to others such as AVI or XVID. Once again, even though they where ripped for an AppleTV they ARE playable on a PC. 


===============
The clock is ticking. 

"Right now, terrorists are plotting to assassinate a presidential candidate. My wife and daughter have been kidnapped... and people that I work with may be involved in both. I'm Federal Agent Jack Bauer, and today is the longest day of my life." 
- Jack Bauer
===============

Format: AppleTV
Source: DVD
Codec: H.264, AAC
Resolution: 854x480
Bitrate: 1500 kbps
